DtvRemoteKey1

Remote key providing events for button presses

  • [Out] ok:

  • [Out] exit:

  • [Out] up:

  • [Out] down:

  • [Out] right:

EDIT - list of tags available to link to the ports for the component in the HTML: [Out]menu, [Out]ok, [Out]exit, [Out]up, [Out]down, [Out]left, [Out]right,
